title: Pillow Cover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, gilt paper, paint
Technique: slit tapestry weave (k'ossu)
description: Four pieces which, when assembled, would form a small pillow.  Each panel contains a dragon with fangs surrounde by cloud motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pillow Cover, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, gilt paper, paint
Technique: slit tapestry weave (k'ossu). Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-475-a/d.
